job_history.work_description: Managed Subsidy Revenue and A/R process associated with over 70 contracts totaling $53 million in revenue. Prepared monthly invoices, audit lead-schedules, budgeting and forecasting revenue, collections and expense control activities. Accruals, contract reviews. Quality measure benchmarks.

Maintained the day-to-day financial activities of the Company including payroll, accounts receivable, Accounts payable, month end closings. Financial statements reconciliations. Preparation of financial statements, general ledger, account analysis and reconciliation, journal entries, and performed variance analysis.

Maintained the day-to-day financial activities of the Company including payroll, accounts receivable, Accounts payable, month end closings. Financial statements reconciliations. Preparation of financial statements, general ledger, account analysis and reconciliation, journal entries, and performed variance analysis.

Prepared financial statements, general ledger, account analysis and reconciliation, journal entries, and performed variance analysis. Cost containment and cash management of Facility. Compiled periodic financial reporting packages. External audits to ensure regulatory compliance and operational efficiency/accuracy.

skills.name: Financial Statement Preparation
skills.explanation: Extensive experience in preparing financial statements, general ledger, account analysis and reconciliation, journal entries, and performing variance analysis across multiple roles and companies, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Financial Reconciliation
skills.explanation: Consistently maintained and reconciled financial statements, accounts receivable, accounts payable, and performed variance analysis, showing expert-level proficiency.

skills.name: Payroll Management
skills.explanation: Handled payroll activities as a Senior Accountant and Controller, suggesting strong proficiency in payroll management.

skills.name: Budgeting
skills.explanation: Involved in budgeting and forecasting revenue, collections, and expense control activities, indicating strong proficiency in budgeting.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Held leadership roles as a Senior Accountant and Controller, managing financial activities and teams, suggesting strong proficiency in leadership.
